content: Op welk moment crasht de computer of Thunderbird, is dat direct na installatie, of na een eerste of tweede gebruik waarbij al een account is ingesteld? content:
Same problem with Thunderbird ESR 128.X

And I have found two other related topics, that suggest the policy just doesn't work: - https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1469865 - https://thunderbird.topicbox.com/groups/enterprise/T2ef6c8716a08f655-Mbf0511906161fd4761da2daf/128-0-1esr-available-on-esr-update-channel

content: (last update) It's been an "unconfirmed" bug for a year: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1910603
creator: mael.charlut

content: Please remember that it is not Thunderbird refusing your password, it is your email provider, using Thunderbird to deliver the message. The real error may be that the account is improperly configured. If you want assistance, you will need to post screenshots of your incoming and outgoing server settings panes, plus the complete error page. Thanks.
creator: davidsk

content: Devi chiedere al tuo fornitore, solo lui sa a cosa corrisponde l'errore "policy violation" Normalmente significa che non stai rispettando le condizioni di fornitura. Thunderbird comunque ti sta solo mostrando il messaggio che riceve dal server.
creator: @next

content:
Se in Modalità risoluzione dei problemi funziona, allora:

  1. se hai delle estensioni disattivale tutte e fino a trovare quella responsabile del problema
  2. se questo non risolve, disattiva l'accelerazione hardware -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/impostazioni-thunderbird-pannello-avanzate#w_impostazioni-avanzate

Per prudenza fai prima un backup -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/profili-thunderbird#w_effettuare-una-copia-di-sicurezza-del-profilo
creator: @next

content: There is no donation requirement. You may donate at an amount which represents the value you are getting from Thunderbird on these devices.
creator: wsmwk

content:
Forse è stato attivato il nuovo Centro account Lo puoi disattivare da

Menu > Impostazioni > Generale Sezione Centro account Togli la spunta da Crea account nel nuovo Centro account

A questo punto puoi usare la vecchia procedura automatica -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/configurazione-automatica-account

o la procedura manuale -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/configurazione-manuale-account
creator: @next

content: You should talk to your email provider about password reset options.
creator: christ1

content: Christ1, thanks for the reply... I do have my own domain which use just for e-mails... So the smtp settings are my own, but I can´t remember the password
creator: mail2456

content: I suppose you did receive email server settings from your hosting provider? Then you should probably check with your hosting provider about a password reset. Did you tell Thunderbird to remember the password by any chance? Then you may be able to recover it from the Thunderbird 'Saved Passwords' underneath Settings. However, if that was the case then you shouldn't have got a password prompt in the first place.
creator: christ1

content: click settings>composition and turn it off. If you are also seeing grammar suggestions, those may be coming from an addon or other software running on your computer.
creator: davidsk

content: Exactly where do I turn it off??
creator: BSM1

content: puzzling. click 'new message' and click options from menu bar and see if it is ticked there. if menu bar isn't visible, click the alt key. If it's turned off there too, my suspicion is that another product is doing this. Some grammar products that work with browser also involve themselves with email. And do check your addons.
creator: davidsk

content: I do not understand your question, but when you're in the compose window, you can click F9 to have a list of email addresses listed to the left of the composition window.
creator: davidsk
